Penalty Kicks Allowed
Post-Shot Expected Goals per Shot on Target. Not including penalty kicks. Higher numbers indicate that shots on target faced are more difficult to stop and more likely to score

Post-Shot Expected Goals. PSxG is expected goals based on how likely the goalkeeper is to save the shot. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).

Post-Shot Expected Goals minus Goals Allowed. Positive numbers suggest better luck or an above average ability to stop shots. PSxG is expected goals based on how likely the goalkeeper is to save the shot. Does not include own goals.
Post-Shot Expected Goals minus Goals Allowed per 90 minutes. Does not include own goals

Number of times blocking a shot by standing in its path
Number of times blocking the ball by standing in its path

Percentage of dribblers tackled. Minimum .625 dribblers challenged per squad game to qualify as a leader
Number of unsuccessful challenges plus number of dribblers tackled
Number of unsuccessful attempts to challenge a dribbling player

Goal-Creating Actions. The two offensive actions directly leading to a goal, such as passes, take-ons and drawing fouls. A single player can receive credit for multiple actions and the shot-taker can also receive credit.
Defensive actions that lead to a goal
Fouls drawn that lead to a goal
Completed dead-ball passes that lead to a goal. Includes free kicks, corner kicks, kick offs, throw-ins and goal kicks
Completed live-ball passes that lead to a goal
Goal-Creating Actions per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Shots that lead to another goal-scoring shot
Successful take-ons that lead to a goal

Shot-Creating Actions. The two offensive actions directly leading to a shot, such as passes, take-ons and drawing fouls. A single player can receive credit for multiple actions and the shot-taker can also receive credit.
Defensive actions that lead to a shot attempt
Fouls drawn that lead to a shot attempt
Completed dead-ball passes that lead to a shot attempt. Includes free kicks, corner kicks, kick offs, throw-ins and goal kicks
Completed live-ball passes that lead to a shot attempt
Shot-Creating Actions per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Shots that lead to another shot attempt
Successful take-ons that lead to a shot attempt
Clean Sheets. Full matches by goalkeeper where no goals are allowed.

Expected Assists. The likelihood each completed pass becomes a goal assists given the pass type, phase of play, location and distance. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Passes Attempted. Includes live ball passes (including crosses) as well as corner kicks, throw-ins, free kicks and goal kicks.
Passes Completed. Includes live ball passes (including crosses) as well as corner kicks, throw-ins, free kicks and goal kicks.
Passes Completed. Passes longer than 30 yards
Passes Completed. Passes between 15 and 30 yards
Passes Completed. Passes between 5 and 15 yards
Completed passes that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal. Not including set pieces
Completed passes into the 18-yard box. Not including set pieces
Passes Attempted. Passes longer than 30 yards
Passes Attempted. Passes between 15 and 30 yards

Pass Completion Percentage. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader. Includes live ball passes (including crosses) as well as corner kicks, throw-ins, free kicks and goal kicks.
Pass Completion Percentage. Passes longer than 30 yards. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Pass Completion Percentage. Passes between 15 and 30 yards. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Pass Completion Percentage. Passes between 5 and 15 yards. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Progressive Distance. Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled towards the opponent's goal. Passes away from opponent's goal are counted as zero progressive yards.
Passes Attempted. Passes between 5 and 15 yards
Total distance, in yards, that completed passes have traveled in any direction

Progressive Passes. Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal line at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Expected Assisted Goals. xG which follows a pass that assists a shot
Assists minus Expected Goals Assisted
Matches Played by the player or squad
Complete matches played
Game or games started by player
Games as sub. Game or games player did not start, so as a substitute
Minutes
Minutes played divided by 90
Percentage of team's total minutes in which player was on the pitch. Player minutes played divided by team total minutes played. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Minutes Per Match Played
Minutes Per Match Started. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Minutes Per Substitution. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Goals allowed by team while on pitch
Goals scored by team while on pitch
Expected goals allowed by team while on pitch. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted)
Expected goals by team while on pitch. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Plus/Minus. Goals scored minus goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch.
Plus/Minus per 90 Minutes. Goals scored minus goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch per 90 minutes played. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

Net goals per 90 minutes by the team while the player was on the pitch minus net goals allowed per 90 minutes by the team while the player was off the pitch. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Points per Match. Average number of points earned by the team from matches in which the player appeared. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Games as an unused substitute

xG Plus/Minus. Expected goals scored minus expected goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).

xG Plus/Minus per 90 Minutes. Expected goals scored minus expected goals allowed by the team while the player was on the pitch per 90 minutes played. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted). Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader

xG Plus/Minus Net per 90 Minutes. Net expected goals per 90 minutes by the team while the player was on the pitch minus net expected goals per 90 minutes by the team while the player was off the pitch. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Number of times the player controlled the ball with their feet
Total distance, in yards, a player moved the ball while controlling it with their feet, in any direction
Carries that enter the 1/3 of the pitch closest to the goal
Carries into the 18-yard box

Carries that move the ball towards the opponent's goal line at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any carry into the penalty area. Excludes carries which end in the defending 50% of the pitch
Number of times a player loses control of the ball after being tackled by an opposing player. Does not include attempted take-ons
Number of times a player failed when attempting to gain control of a ball
Number of times a player successfully received a pass

Carries that move the ball towards the opponent's goal line at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any carry into the penalty area. Excludes carries which end in the defending 50% of the pitch

Progressive Passes Received. Completed passes that move the ball towards the opponent's goal line at least 10 yards from its furthest point in the last six passes, or any completed pass into the penalty area. Excludes passes from the defending 40% of the pitch
Number of attempts to take on defenders while dribbling
Number of times tackled by a defender during a take-on attempt
Percentage of time tackled by a defender during a take-on attempt. Minimum .5 take-ons per squad game to qualify as a leader
Number of defenders taken on successfully, by dribbling past them. Unsuccessful take-ons include attempts where the dribbler retained possession but was unable to get past the defender

Percentage of Take-Ons Completed Successfully. Unsuccessful take-ons include attempts where the dribbler retained possession but was unable to get past the defender. Minimum .5 take-ons per squad game to qualify as a leader
Number of times a player touched the ball. Note: Receiving a pass, then dribbling, then sending a pass counts as one touch
Touches in attacking 1/3
Touches in attacking penalty area
Touches in defensive 1/3
Touches in defensive penalty area
Live-ball touches. Does not include corner kicks, free kicks, throw-ins, kick-offs, goal kicks or penalty kicks
Touches in middle 1/3
Average distance, in yards, from goal of all shots taken. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader. Does not include penalty kicks
Goals scored or allowed
Goals per shot. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader
Goals per shot on target. Minimum .111 shots on target per squad game to qualify as a leader. Note: Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
Non-Penalty Expected Goals
Non-Penalty Goals minus Non-Penalty Expected Goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Non-Penalty Expected Goals per shot. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader
Penalty Kicks Attempted
Penalty Kicks Made
Shots Total. Does not include penalty kicks
Shots from Free Kicks
Shots on Target. Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
Percentage of shots that are on target. Minimum .395 shots per squad game to qualify as a leader. Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
Shots on target per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader. Shots on target do not include penalty kicks
Shots total per 90 minutes. Minimum 30 minutes played per squad game to qualify as a leader
Expected Goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
Goals minus Expected Goals. xG totals include penalty kicks, but do not include penalty shootouts (unless otherwise noted).
